casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Egbert FRANCIS, Jr. No. 305P97-7. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Egbert Francis, for Francis, Egbert Jr. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 29th of October 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
